section.title:
check runs
voiding of
accounts payable
voiding check runs for Void Check Run
section.para: You may occasionally have a need to void an entire Check Run—if, for example, you print the Check Run on the wrong kind of paper, etc. To void a Check Run, select the "Void Check Run" option. The following screen will appear:
When voiding a Check Run, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the Bank Account whose associated Check Run you want to void.
Displays the first Check Number in the Check Run for the specified Bank Account.
Indicates the number of Checks in the Check Run to be voided. Check Numbers increment in intervals of one (1) beginning with the first Check Number displayed above.

varlistentry.term:
checks
replacing voided Issue Replacement Checks

listitem.para: Select to issue replacement Checks for the Checks being voided.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without voiding the Check Run, returning you to the application desktop.
Voids the Check Run, using the specified parameters.
